title: A Listener Asks Morgan2 Out On A Date + Bleeped Lyrics Game: Food Edition + Jake Owen And ‘Duke Bryan’ Make Surprise Appearances
itunes:title: A Listener Asks Morgan2 Out On A Date + Bleeped Lyrics Game: Food Edition + Jake Owen And ‘Duke Bryan’ Make Surprise Appearances
description:
Bobby takes a call from a listener who was upset that Morgan2 didn’t take a date to his holiday party…and then he offers to take her out on a date. We call him "PhD Peter". We play the bleeped lyrics game where they are all food. We also have special appearances by Jake Owen and ‘Duke Bryan’ who is Luke Bryan’s Cousin.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
